perksWithImages.name: Nowhere to Hide
perksWithImages.description:
The machinations of the weak and craven draw your ire. Your anger forces Survivors to reveal themselves.

Whenever you damage a generator, reveal the aura of all Survivors standing within {0} meters of your position for {1} seconds.

perksWithImages.name: Dark Arrogance
perksWithImages.description:
When everything is going right, you are an inescapable inevitability.

Increases the duration you are blinded by any means and the duration of pallet stuns by {0}%.

Increases regular vault speed by {1}%.

“Run all you want. I will not be denied.” - Vecna

perksWithImages.name: Prove Thyself
perksWithImages.description:
For every other Survivor working on a generator within a {0} meter range, gain {1}% repair speed bonus. This same bonus is also applied to all other Survivors within range.

Survivors can only be affected by one Prove Thyself effect at a time.

perksWithImages.name: Do No Harm
perksWithImages.description:
Helping those in need comes easily, no matter how dire things get.

When you heal another Survivor, for each Hook State they have, heal {0}% faster and gain {1}% progress for succeeding great Skill Checks.

"Look at me. My name's Orela, and I'm gonna make sure you're all right." - Orela Rose
